title: U.S. files more charges against FTX founder Bankman-Fried
description: Indictment provides new details on how political donations may have violated campaign finance laws.

title: How to choose the best weather app
description: How to choose the best weather app for daily forecasts and extreme conditions.

title: European Commission bans TikTok from staff phones over security fears
description: The decision follows similar moves in the United States amid a growing confrontation between China, home to TikTok's parent firm, and the West.

title: Facebook’s shakedown: Charging you $12 just to protect your account
description: Big Tech’s new business model is making you pay for security and basic customer service. That’s called a protection racket when mobsters do it.
